## [2.0.0-preview0005] - 2024-06-12_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Changed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Transferred ownership to DSCCommunity.org -_x000D__x000A_ fixes [Issue #31](https://github.com/dsccommunity/FileContentDsc/issues/39)._x000D__x000A_- BREAKING CHANGE: Changed resource prefix from MSFT to DSC._x000D__x000A_- Updated to use continuous delivery pattern using Azure DevOps - fixes_x000D__x000A_ [Issue #41](https://github.com/dsccommunity/FileContentDsc/issues/41)._x000D__x000A_- Updated build badges in README.MD._x000D__x000A_- Change Azure DevOps Pipeline definition to include `source/*` - Fixes [Issue #45](https://github.com/dsccommunity/FileContentDsc/issues/45)._x000D__x000A_- Updated pipeline to use `latest` version of `ModuleBuilder` - Fixes [Issue #45](https://github.com/dsccommunity/FileContentDsc/issues/45)._x000D__x000A_- Merge `HISTORIC_CHANGELOG.md` into `CHANGELOG.md` - Fixes [Issue #46](https://github.com/dsccommunity/FileContentDsc/issues/46)._x000D__x000A_- Fixed build failures caused by changes in `ModuleBuilder` module v1.7.0_x000D__x000A_ by changing `CopyDirectories` to `CopyPaths` - Fixes [Issue #49](https://github.com/dsccommunity/FileContentDsc/issues/49)._x000D__x000A_- Updated to use the common module _DscResource.Common_ - Fixes [Issue #48](https://github.com/dsccommunity/FileContentDsc/issues/48)._x000D__x000A_- Pin `Pester` module to 4.10.1 because Pester 5.0 is missing code_x000D__x000A_ coverage - Fixes [Issue #50](https://github.com/dsccommunity/FileContentDsc/issues/50)._x000D__x000A_- Automatically publish documentation to GitHub Wiki - Fixes [Issue #51](https://github.com/dsccommunity/FileContentDsc/issues/51)._x000D__x000A_- Renamed `master` branch to `main` - Fixes [Issue #53](https://github.com/dsccommunity/FileContentDsc/issues/53)._x000D__x000A_- Updated `GitVersion.yml` to latest pattern - Fixes [Issue #57](https://github.com/dsccommunity/FileContentDsc/issues/57)._x000D__x000A_- Updated build to use `Sampler.GitHubTasks` - Fixes [Issue #60](https://github.com/dsccommunity/FileContentDsc/issues/60)._x000D__x000A_- Added support for publishing code coverage to `CodeCov.io` and_x000D__x000A_ Azure Pipelines - Fixes [Issue #61](https://github.com/dsccommunity/FileContentDsc/issues/61)._x000D__x000A_- Updated .github issue templates to standard - Fixes [Issue #64](https://github.com/dsccommunity/FileContentDsc/issues/64)._x000D__x000A_- Added Create_ChangeLog_GitHub_PR task to publish stage of build pipeline._x000D__x000A_- Added SECURITY.md._x000D__x000A_- Updated pipeline Deploy_Module anb Code_Coverage jobs to use ubuntu-latest_x000D__x000A_ images - Fixes [Issue #63](https://github.com/dsccommunity/FileContentDsc/issues/63)._x000D__x000A_- Updated pipeline unit tests and integration tests to use Windows Server 2019 and_x000D__x000A_ Windows Server 2022 images - Fixes [Issue #63](https://github.com/dsccommunity/FileContentDsc/issues/63)._x000D__x000A_- CI Pipeline_x000D__x000A_ - Updated pipeline files to match current DSC Community patterns - fixes [Issue #71](https://github.com/dsccommunity/FileContentDsc/issues/71)._x000D__x000A_ - Updated HQRM and build steps to use windows-latest image._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_### Fixed_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_- Fixed pipeline by replacing the GitVersion task in the `azure-pipelines.yml`_x000D__x000A_ with a script.
